alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oneida County through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Forestport, or near Boonville, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boonville, Forestport, Steuben, Remsen, Alder Creek, Hawkinsville, Pixley Falls State Park and Woodgate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
